entry.title: vue父子组件之间的传值
entry.summary: 最近正在学习vue，记录一编vue中父组件向子组件传值的例子
entry.content:
最近正在学习vue，记录一编vue中父组件向子组件传值的例子

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <title>Title</title>
</head>
<body>


<!-- 子组件模板 -->
<template id="t1">
    <div>
        <h1>{{ childmessage }}</h1>
        <ul>
            <li v-for="item in childmovies">{{ item }}</li>
        </ul>
    </div>
</template>

<!-- 父组件模板 -->
<div id="app">
    <!--    <p>{{ message }}</p>-->
    <child :childmovies="movies" v-bind:childmessage="message"></child>
</div>
<script type="application/javascript" src="vue.js"></script>


<script>
    const app = new Vue({
        el: '#app',
        data: {
            message: 'Hello Vue',
            movies: ['python', 'java']
        },
        components: {
            child: {
                template: '#t1',
                props: {
                    'childmovies': {
                        type: Array,
                        default: ['123', '456']
                    },
                    'childmessage': {
                        type: String,
                        default: '吃吃吃'
                    }
                },
                data() {
                    return {}
                }

            }
        }
    })
</script>

</body>
</html>
